remarks.para: May be inoperative provided bus is deactivated.

note.para: If Right Utility BUS inoperative, oven/hot cup module is inoperative.

numlitem.para: For left and/or right utility bus inoperative: The forward and/or aft cargo heating systems are inoperative.

note.para: Consideration must be given to perishable cargo in affected zone (FWD/AFT Cabin).

placard.para: Placard associated L or R Utility Bus Switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: To deactivate the utility bus, open and collar the applicable circuit breaker on the P11 panel Row R.

note.para: The following items are to be considered inoperative with L Utility Bus Switch OFF:
The following items are to be considered inoperative with R Utility Bus Switch OFF:
